attributes.action: Give full British Citezenship (including the right to benefits, residency, and vote) only after 2 years national service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: National service is the answer to our counries problems it will instill a sense of respect and citizenship in our youth while educating them in  hands on professions and ensure we restrict numbers of immigrants, by requiring national service without turning them away.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
